channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23839|2023-08-03T20:18:54.847Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Exposure of Sensitive Information Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users to access Orion.WebCommunityStrings SWIS schema object and obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-23842|2023-09-14T19:02:46.041Z -- solarwinds -- network%20configuration%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Network Configuration Manager was susceptible to the Directory Traversal Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users with administrative access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-23843|2023-08-03T20:21:29.267Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Incorrect Comparison Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users with administrative access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-23838|2023-08-03T20:17:22.016Z -- solarwinds -- database%20performance%20analyzer
item.description: Directory traversal and file enumeration vulnerability which allowed users to enumerate to different folders of the server.

item.title: CVE-2023-23844|2023-08-03T20:22:21.214Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Incorrect Comparison Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users with administrative access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-23845|2023-12-28T17:03:05.656Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Incorrect Comparison Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users with administrative access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands with NETWORK SERVICE privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-23840|2023-12-28T17:02:22.963Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Incorrect Comparison Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users with administrative access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands with NETWORK SERVICE privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-23837|2023-08-03T20:15:05.524Z -- solarwinds -- database%20performance%20analyzer
item.description: No exception handling vulnerability which revealed sensitive or excessive information to users.

item.title: CVE-2023-23836|2023-08-03T20:09:20.755Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform version 2022.4.1 was found to be susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with Orion admin-level account access to the SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-23841|2023-08-03T20:20:31.933Z -- solarwinds -- servu
item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U is submitting an HTTP request when changing or updating the attributes for File Share or File request. Part of the URL of the request discloses sensitive data.

item.title: CVE-2023-33229|2023-09-14T19:04:22.466Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Incorrect Input Neutralization Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with a valid SolarWinds Platform account to append URL parameters to inject passive HTML.

item.title: CVE-2023-33225|2023-12-28T17:04:09.712Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Incorrect Comparison Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users with administrative access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-33224|2023-08-03T20:23:59.784Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Incorrect Behavior Order Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users with administrative access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands with NETWORK SERVICE privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-33228|2023-11-01T15:32:03.881Z -- solarwinds -- network%20configuration%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Network Configuration Manager was susceptible to the Exposure of Sensitive Information Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users with administrative access to SolarWinds Web Console to obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-33227|2023-11-01T15:31:27.347Z -- solarwinds -- network%20configuration%20manager
item.description: The Network Configuration Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability This vulnerability allows a low level user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-33231|2023-08-03T20:25:05.945Z -- solarwinds -- dpa
item.description: XSS attack was possible in DPA 2023.2 due to insufficient input validation

item.title: CVE-2023-33226|2023-11-01T15:31:09.130Z -- solarwinds -- network%20configuration%20manager
item.description: The Network Configuration Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a low-level user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-40053|2023-12-28T17:06:54.418Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified within Serv-U 15.4 that allows an authenticated actor to insert content on the file share function feature of Serv-U, which could be used maliciously.

item.title: CVE-2023-40058|2024-01-04T13:33:57.792Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: Sensitive data was added to our public-facing knowledgebase that, if exploited, could be used to access components of Access Rights Manager (ARM) if the threat actor is in the same environment.

item.title: CVE-2023-40062|2023-11-01T15:29:56.898Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform Incomplete List of Disallowed Inputs Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If executed, this vulnerability would allow a low-privileged user to execute commands with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-40054|2023-11-09T15:05:53.355Z -- solarwinds -- network%20configuration%20manager
item.description: The Network Configuration Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a low-level user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges. We found this issue was not resolved in CVE-2023-33226

item.title: CVE-2023-40055|2023-11-09T15:06:35.640Z -- solarwinds -- network%20configuration%20manager
item.description: The Network Configuration Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a low-level user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges. We found this issue was not resolved in CVE-2023-33227

item.title: CVE-2023-40060|2023-09-14T19:06:06.147Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified within Serv-U 15.4 and 15.4 Hotfix 1 that, if exploited, allows an actor to bypass multi-factor/two-factor authentication. The actor must have administrator-level access to Serv-U to perform this action. 15.4. SolarWinds found that the issue was not completely fixed in 15.4 Hotfix 1.

item.title: CVE-2023-40056|2023-11-28T17:51:48.838Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SQL Injection Remote Code Vulnerability was found in the SolarWinds Platform. This vulnerability can be exploited with a low privileged account.

item.title: CVE-2023-40057|2024-02-15T20:49:04.504Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to be susceptible to a Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-40061|2023-12-28T17:09:02.482Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: Insecure job execution mechanism vulnerability. This vulnerability can lead to other attacks as a result.

item.title: CVE-2023-35187|2023-10-19T14:24:33.720Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to achieve the Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-35186|2023-10-19T14:21:57.282Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-35181|2023-10-19T14:24:54.662Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Privilege Escalation Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users to abuse incorrect folder permission resulting in Privilege Escalation.

item.title: CVE-2023-35179|2023-09-14T19:05:04.546Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified within Serv-U 15.4 that, if exploited, allows an actor to bypass multi-factor/two-factor authentication. The actor must have administrator-level access to Serv-U to perform this action.

item.title: CVE-2023-35180|2023-10-19T14:23:48.383Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows authenticated users to abuse SolarWinds ARM API.

item.title: CVE-2023-35183|2023-10-19T14:23:59.019Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Privilege Escalation Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows authenticated users to abuse local resources to Privilege Escalation.

item.title: CVE-2023-35182|2023-10-19T14:23:31.797Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability can be abused by unauthenticated users on SolarWinds ARM Server.

item.title: CVE-2023-35185|2023-12-28T17:05:58.115Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Vulnerability using SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-35188|2024-02-06T16:00:21.973Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability was found using a create statement in the SolarWinds Platform. This vulnerability requires user authentication to be exploited.

item.title: CVE-2023-35184|2023-10-19T14:22:26.928Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service resulting in a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-50395|2024-02-06T15:59:48.664Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability was found using an update statement in the SolarWinds Platform. This vulnerability requires user authentication to be exploited

item.title: CVE-2023-3622|2023-12-28T17:01:30.181Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: Access Control Bypass Vulnerability in the SolarWinds Platform that allows an underprivileged user to read arbitrary resource

item.title: CVE-2024-28073|2024-04-17T16:58:12.353Z -- solarwinds -- servu
item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Vulnerability. This vulnerability requires a highly privileged account to be exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-28072|2024-05-03T07:50:00.696Z -- solarwinds -- serv-u
item.description: A highly privileged account can overwrite arbitrary files on the system with log output. The log file path tags were not sanitized properly.

item.title: CVE-2024-28999|2024-06-06T15:36:31.610Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a Race Condition Vulnerability affecting the web console.

item.title: CVE-2024-28075|2024-06-05T16:14:26.541Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description:
The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse SolarWinds service resulting in remote code execution.
We thank Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative (ZDI) for its ongoing partnership in coordinating with SolarWinds on responsible disclosure of this and other potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-28995|2024-06-10T13:06:50.624Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20serv-u
item.description: SolarWinds Serv-U was susceptible to a directory transversal vulnerability that would allow access to read sensitive files on the host machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-28996|2024-06-05T05:15:36.855Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a SWQL Injection Vulnerability. Attack complexity is high for this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28076|2024-06-04T18:03:17.880Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a Arbitrary Open Redirection Vulnerability. A potential attacker can redirect to different domain when using URL parameter with relative entry in the correct format

item.title: CVE-2024-0692|2024-03-01T08:55:35.848Z -- solarwinds -- security%20event%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Security Event Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to abuse SolarWinds’ service, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-29004|2024-06-05T14:18:57.420Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-29003|2024-06-04T17:57:46.757Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a XSS vulnerability that affects the maps section of the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and requires user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-29001|2024-06-04T17:57:23.613Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: A SolarWinds Platform SWQL Injection Vulnerability was identified in the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and user interaction to be exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-29000|2024-06-06T15:36:39.203Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-23473|2024-05-09T12:43:51.111Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description:
The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager was found to contain a hard-coded credential authentication bypass vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows access to the RabbitMQ management console.
We thank Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative (ZDI) for its ongoing partnership in coordinating with SolarWinds on responsible disclosure of this and other potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-23479|2024-02-15T20:48:01.016Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to achieve a Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23478|2024-02-15T20:48:13.041Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) was found to be susceptible to a Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an authenticated user to abuse a SolarWinds service, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23477|2024-02-15T20:48:50.612Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to achieve a Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23476|2024-02-15T20:48:39.529Z -- solarwinds -- access%20rights%20manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Access Rights Manager (ARM) was found to be susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. If exploited, this vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to achieve the Remote Code Execution.
